description.en:
"SCAM token was created as a learning experience by its founder for himself. However due to to the huge public exposure from several social media platforms, the token has received huge popularity since then and has been featured on platforms such as world star and podcasts. 

After huge amount of community support, a team has been put together and a road-map is currently underway, targeting education for people entering the cryptocurrency space and  building a closely knit crypto-community. As these are the core values of the coins founder."
